option.description: The buyer has not paid for the item
We have both agreed not to complete the transaction
Buyer purchased item by mistake or changed mind
Buyer is returning item for a refund
Buyer and I disagreed over terms
Buyer's payment hasn't been received or hasn't cleared
Buyer requested shipment to an unconfirmed address
Seller doesn't ship to the country requested by buyer

field.name: condition1
field.title: Allow no more than
field.tooltip: days between the first and last transactions to add in order

field.name: isRunWinnerNotify
field.title: Enable send winner buyer notification automatically

field.name: isRunBlockItem
field.title: Enable to automatic block item that out of stock
